name: Let there be KOs
description:
Let there be KOs is about starting a chaotic all vs one fight in a boringly calm town, How long you'll be able to punch your way through?

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Space: Jump
Left Shift: Run Toggle
Left Click: PUNCH
Right Click: Dash

For better performance use the downloadable version

This game was developed within one week as part of Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam, with the theme being Let there be Chaos

Game Develop & Programming by Gabriel Aguirre González
3D Art, Level Design & Logo Design by Vicente Raiol
Music & Sounds by Isaac Turley
3D Animation by Dogus Kuner
Button Design by Irem Bettas
